preferencesDescription: Manage your general application preferences and appearance settings.
themeDescription: Choose between light, dark, or system theme preference.
languageDescription: Select your preferred language for the interface.
systemSettingsDescription: Configure system-level settings and advanced options.
esmUrlDescription: Javascript CDN URL for package imports.
projectTemplatesDescription: Templates available to the AI when creating new projects.
previewDomainDescription: Domain used for iframe preview sandboxing.
corsProxyDescription: HTTP proxy URL for bypassing CORS restrictions.
serviceWorkerNotRegistered: No service worker is currently registered. Service workers are automatically registered when you load the application.
serviceWorkerUpdatedDescription: The service worker has been updated successfully.
serviceWorkerUnregisteredDescription: The service worker has been unregistered. Refresh the page to complete the process.
serviceWorkerCacheClearedDescription: All service worker caches have been cleared.
faviconUrlDescription: URL template for fetching favicons. Available variables: {hostname}, {origin}, {href}, {protocol}, {pathname}
showcaseEnabledDescription: Display the app showcase section on the home page
showcaseModeratorDescription: Nostr public key (npub) of the user who can moderate showcase submissions
projectsDirectoryDescription: Filesystem path where projects are stored
configDirectoryDescription: Filesystem path where configuration files are stored
sentryDsnDescription: Sentry Data Source Name (DSN) for error reporting. Leave empty to disable Sentry.
shareErrorReportsDescription: Help improve this app by automatically sending crash and error reports.
systemPromptDescription: AI system prompt controlling the assistant's behavior and knowledge.
name: Name
selectModelToDescribe: Select a model below to get started...
examplePrompt: Describe what you'd like to build...
aiSettingsDescription: Configure AI providers and API keys
gitSettingsDescription: Configure Git credentials for HTTP authentication
nostrSettingsDescription: Configure relay connections and Nostr preferences
storageSettingsDescription: Export files and manage local data
emailUpdatesDescription: Subscribe to Shakespeare updates and resources
createFirstProject: Create your first project to get started
aiAssistantReady: Your AI-powered development assistant is ready to help you build, edit, and enhance your project.
askMeFeatures: üí° Ask me to add new features
getHelp: üîß Get help with debugging and optimization
askToAddFeatures: Ask me to add features, edit files, or build your project...
selectModelFirst: Please select a model to start chatting...
buildProjectToSeePreview: Build your project to see the preview here
selectFileFromExplorer: Select a file from the explorer to edit
noFilesFoundSearch: No files found matching your search
repositoryStatusDescription: View repository status and sync with remote repositories
noCredentialsWarning: No credentials configured for {{provider}}. Push/pull operations may fail for private repositories.
filesWithChanges: {{count}} file with changes | {{count}} files with changes
notGitRepoOrBranch: Not a git repository or no current branch
noCommitsAhead: No commits ahead of remote. Commit your changes first.
providerExists: Provider with this name already exists
loginToNostrRequired: Log in to Nostr to use this provider
shakespeareDeployNostrAuth: This provider uses Nostr authentication. Make sure you are logged in to deploy.
credentialsExist: Credentials for this origin already exist
gitIdentityDescription: If both name and email are configured, they will be used as the commit author. Otherwise, shakespeare.diy will be used. When co-author is enabled, Shakespeare will be added as a co-author.
mirrorsDescription: Shakespeare is available at multiple mirror URLs for redundancy and accessibility.
offlineCacheDescription: Shakespeare caches files locally to enable offline functionality. Clear the cache to free up space or troubleshoot issues.
cacheClearedDescription: Offline cache has been cleared successfully.
exportFilesDescription: Download all your projects and files as a ZIP archive. This includes all project files, settings, and data stored locally.
clearAllDataDescription: Permanently delete all local data including projects, settings, and cached information. This action cannot be undone.
clearDataWarning: This action will permanently delete all local data from this browser, including:
actionCannotBeUndone: This action cannot be undone. Consider exporting your files first.
filesExportedDescription: Your project files have been downloaded as a zip file.
dataClearedDescription: All local data has been removed. Redirecting to homepage...
persistDataDescription: Request persistent storage to prevent data loss when browser storage is low. This helps protect your projects and settings.
persistentStorageGrantedDescription: Your browser will now protect your data from automatic cleanup.
persistentStorageAlreadyGrantedDescripti: Your data is already protected from automatic cleanup.
persistentStorageDeniedDescription: Your browser declined the request. Data may still be cleared automatically when storage is low.
persistentStorageNotSupportedDescription: Your browser does not support persistent storage requests.
tryCustomModel: Try using a custom model instead.
invalidApiKey: Invalid API key for {{provider}}. Please check your API key in Settings.
totalCostSession: Total cost for this chat session
noAccountsLoggedIn: No accounts logged in. Add an account to get started.
invalidRelayUrlDescription: Please enter a valid relay URL.
relayAlreadyExistsDescription: This relay is already in your list.
relayListPublishedDescription: Your relay list has been published to Nostr.
relayListPublishFailedDescription: Could not publish your relay list to Nostr.
relaysSyncedDescription: Your relay list has been synced from Nostr.
loginToSyncRelays: Log in to automatically sync your relay list with Nostr.
cloneGitRepository: Clone a Git repository into your Shakespeare workspace
pleaseEnterValidGitUrl: Please enter a valid Git repository URL or Nostr clone URI (e.g., nostr://npub.../repo-name)
repositoryClonedFromNostr: "{{repoName}}" has been cloned from Nostr and is ready for development.
repositoryClonedReady: "{{repoName}}" has been cloned and is ready for development.
repositoryNotFoundOnNostr: Repository not found on Nostr network. Please check the URI and try again.
noCloneUrlsFound: Repository announcement found but no clone URLs available.
allCloneAttemptsFailed: Repository found but all clone URLs failed. The repository may be unavailable.
repositoryNotFound: Repository not found. Please check the URL and try again.
accessDenied: Access denied. The repository may be private or require authentication.
networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
featuredAppsDescription: Handpicked applications showcasing the best of our community
templatesDescription: Ready-to-use templates to kickstart your project
clickToViewMore: Click to view more community apps
noAppsFound: No apps found. Try another relay?
aiPoweredDevelopmentAssistant: Your AI-powered development assistant for building custom applications. Simply describe what you want to build, and AI will help you create it.
shakespeareOpenSource: Shakespeare is Open Source software that runs entirely in your web browser
yourDeviceConnects: Your device connects directly to third-party AI providers of your choice
filesStoredOnDevice: Your files are stored on your device in your browser
carefulBrowserData: Be careful not to delete your browser data or you may lose project files
responsibleBackups: You are responsible for taking backups or syncing to git
qualityDependsOnInput: Quality of output depends on quality of input and models used, and is not guaranteed
shakespeareNotCloudService: Shakespeare is not a cloud service. It's Open Source software that runs on your device. You agree to the Terms of Service of AI providers you interact with. Shakespeare is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind.
selectAIProviderDescription: Select an AI provider to power your development assistant. You can add more providers later in settings.
noModelsAvailable: No models available. Please check your connection and try again.
noModelsMatchingSearch: No models found matching your search.
aiAssistantConfigured: Your AI assistant is configured and ready to help. Just enter your prompt to start building amazing Nostr applications.
paymentHistoryAppears: Your payment history will appear here
createGiftCards: Create {{count}} Gift Card | Create {{count}} Gift Cards
createGiftCardsToShare: Create gift cards to share with others
stripeCheckoutOpened: Stripe checkout opened in a new window.
lightningPaymentSent: Your Lightning payment has been sent successfully.
successfullyCreatedGiftCards: Successfully created {{count}} gift card | Successfully created {{count}} gift cards.
creditsAddedToAccount: {{amount}} has been added to your account.
enterGiftCardCodePrompt: Please enter a gift card code.
paymentExpiredMessage: The payment has expired. Please create a new payment.
noActiveGiftCardsToPrint: You have no active gift cards to print.
failedToOpenPrintWindow: Failed to open print window. Please allow popups for this site.
failedToGenerateQRCodes: Failed to generate QR codes for printing
noActiveGiftCardsToDownload: You have no active gift cards to download.
downloadedGiftCards: Downloaded {{count}} gift card | Downloaded {{count}} gift cards.
readyToAddCredits: Ready to add these credits to your account?
giftCardNotFound: This gift card could not be found.
giftCardAlreadyRedeemed: This gift card has already been redeemed.
pluginsDescription: Extend the AI's capabilities with reusable skills from Git repositories.
pluginDescription: Plugins can contain skills that extend the AI's capabilities with specialized workflows.
noSkillsFound: No skills found in this plugin.
noPluginsConfigured: No plugins configured. Add a plugin to get started.
pluginsDirectoryDescription: Directory where plugins are stored in the virtual filesystem.
discoverPluginsDescription: Browse and install Shakespeare plugins shared on the Nostr network.
noPluginsFound: No plugins found matching your search.
noPluginsAvailable: No plugins available at this time.
noCloneUrlDescription: This plugin does not have a clone URL configured.
loginToDiscoverPlugins: Log in with Nostr to discover plugins from people you follow.
noPluginsFromNetworkDescription: No plugins found from people you follow. Follow plugin developers on Nostr to see their plugins here.
mcpServersDescription: Connect to Model Context Protocol servers to extend the AI's capabilities with external tools.
mcpServerDescription: MCP servers provide tools that can be discovered and used by the AI assistant.
noMcpServersConfigured: No MCP servers configured. Add a server to get started.
mcpServerAddedDescription: MCP server "{{name}}" has been added successfully.
mcpServerDeletedDescription: MCP server "{{name}}" has been deleted successfully.
mcpServerHeadersDescription: Add custom HTTP headers to be sent with requests to this MCP server (e.g., Authorization headers).
toolDiscoveryFailed: Failed to discover tools from this server
projectsDirectoryDescription: Directory where projects are stored in the virtual filesystem.
configDirectoryDescription: Directory where configuration files are stored in the virtual filesystem.
temporaryDirectoryDescription: Directory for temporary files in the virtual filesystem.
templateUpdateFailedDescription: Failed to update the project template from the remote repository. Using the cached version instead.
templatesDirectoryDescription: Directory where project templates are cached in the virtual filesystem.
templateAddedDescription: Project template '{{name}}' has been added successfully.
noTemplatesConfigured: No project templates configured yet. Add a template to get started.
atLeastOneTemplateRequired: At least one template is required
duplicateProjectDescription: Create a copy of this project with a new name
